item.title: Auto-RT: Automatic Jailbreak Strategy Exploration for Red-Teaming Large Language Models
item.description: AUTO-RT automates LLM vulnerability discovery by using reinforcement learning to optimize complex attack strategies, achieving faster detection and higher success rates than existing methods.

item.title: Mimir: Improving Video Diffusion Models for Precise Text Understanding
item.description: Mimir: A novel framework harmonizes LLMs and video diffusion models for precise text understanding in video generation, producing high-quality videos with superior text comprehension.
